data.text: Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI nɛɛʋɛ bɛ̀, mazɔlɔɔ toɠa ɗa gòoi mɛni,
Saai ma ɠaluiti ti ɠɛa veleveleni mà,
Kɛlɛ gè wooɠulani Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ma, gè ɠɛ ma:
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ɗa nuɓɔɠɔlai ɠɛ, sɔlegɛ,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ɗa naati makɛ, niiti ti la dɛ faa mɔinmɔin kwɛni,
Ungo, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, è ùnmɔɔni, è kùla saai ya,
Nà yɛ ziɛzu fulu nuiti ta-eteai tɛi su,
Ìɲɔ ge la ɠɛni leʋeni, anɛɛ siɛgi zu gè ɠɛni ɠɛɛzu ma la:
Nà-ziiɓɔlɔi zu, gè ɠɛni ɠɛɛzu ɓɔɠɔ ma:
Leeni ɠa nà zoo gè kɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ,
Nà pilɛ sɔlɔɔ ziawɔi lɛ geezu,
Nà nà-minazeɠegiti daazeeli, niiti gè ti ɠɛa Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-wooɠɛɠila nuiti saa vai ɠa ɗa ɠɛ gaazu ga faa ɓaa gola.
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, nà ga ɗa-wotiɠɛ zunui,
Nà faanɛɛ wuuɠwɛɛ zalaɠaiti kula è ʋɛ,
Nà nà-minazeɠegiti daazeeli, niiti gè ti ɠɛa Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ,
